thread.section_title: Kerry Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another wonderful experience
thread.title_full: Another wonderful experience - Review of Kerry Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: angel_pbto
title: Another wonderful experience
text: My 2nd visit to Kerry Beijing and it was just as i remembered - warm hospitality, great customer service, and excellent overall experience. I am very impressed by the spread of amenities available in the guestroom; a reflection of the organisation's attentiveness to details to provide the utmost level of convenience for the guests. This has been another wonderful stay! Keep up the good work, Kerry Beijing!
